django.contrib.gis.db.backends.postgis.models
=============================================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.gis.db.backends.postgis.models

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   The GeometryColumns and SpatialRefSys models for the PostGIS backend.

-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.gis.db.backends.postgis.models.PostGISGeometryColumns
   django.contrib.gis.db.backends.postgis.models.PostGISSpatialRefSys

.. py:class:: PostGISGeometryColumns

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.db.models.Model`


   The 'geometry_columns' view from PostGIS. See the PostGIS
   documentation at Ch. 4.3.2.


   .. py:attribute:: f_table_catalog


   .. py:attribute:: f_table_schema


   .. py:attribute:: f_table_name


   .. py:attribute:: f_geometry_column


   .. py:attribute:: coord_dimension


   .. py:attribute:: srid


   .. py:attribute:: type


   .. py:class:: Meta

      .. py:attribute:: app_label
         :value: 'gis'



      .. py:attribute:: db_table
         :value: 'geometry_columns'



      .. py:attribute:: managed
         :value: False




   .. py:method:: table_name_col()
      :classmethod:


      Return the name of the metadata column used to store the feature table
      name.



   .. py:method:: geom_col_name()
      :classmethod:


      Return the name of the metadata column used to store the feature
      geometry column.

   documentation at Ch. 4.2.1.
